scim::MethodSlot4

Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename R, typename P1, typename P2, typename P3, typename P4>
class scim::MethodSlot4< T, R, P1, P2, P3, P4 >

A slot template for methods in a class of type T taking four arguments of type P1, P2, P3 and P4, and returning a value of type R.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

scim::MethodSlot4< T, R, P1, P2, P3, P4 >::MethodSlot4 ( T *  object,
PMF  function 
) [inline]

Construct a new method slot for a class member function.

Parameters:
object - a pointer to an object of type T.
function - a class method with the signature R (T::*PMF)(P1, P2, P3, P4).

Member Function Documentation

P2  p2,
P3  p3,
P4  p4 
) const [inline, virtual]

Calls the class method connected to this slot passing it arguments p1, p2, p3 and p4.

Returns:
a value of type R returned by the called method.

Implements scim::Slot4< R, P1, P2, P3, P4 >.
